vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐρῑθ-εύομαι,
deponent verb, (ἔριθος) serve, work for hire, [LXX]:—so in active, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]
__II of public officers or characters, canvass, intrigue for office, οἱ ἐριθευόμενοι [Refs 4th c.BC+]; compare ἐξεριθεύομαι.
__II.2 later active, generally, compete with, τινι [Refs 5th c.BC+]: absolutely, indulge in petty intrigue, [Refs]
